block.p: PORTER-Norman. On May 3, 2000. Professional engineer and land surveyor. Beloved husband of Georgia. Dear brother of Blanche Vogel. Norman was a retired U.S. Marine Corps Lieutenant Colonel in W.W.II. Family will receive friends Friday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM at Williams Funeral Home, Inc., 5628 Broadway, at 232 St., Bronx. Funeral service at the Calvary United Methodist Church on Saturday, May 6 at 9:30 AM.

PORTER-Norman. On May 3, 2000. Professional engineer and land surveyor. Beloved husband of Georgia. Dear brother of Blanche Vogel. Norman was a retired U.S. Marine Corps Lieutenant Colonel in W.W.II. Family will receive friends Friday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM at Williams Funeral Home, Inc., 5628 Broadway, at 232 St., Bronx. Funeral service at the Calvary United Methodist Church on Saturday, May 6 at 9:30 AM.
